name: Clippy Video Clipper
description: Integrates with the Clipper platform to create video clips using the Clippy AI agent. Send video URLs and prompts to get back clips with captions and preferred aspect ratios. Supports credit balance tracking, job polling, and automatic clip saving.

clipper_api_url.label: Clipper API URL
clipper_api_url.description: Base URL of the Clipper platform API

auto_save_clips.label: Auto-save Clips
auto_save_clips.description: Automatically save generated clips to your ThinkOS clips library

poll_interval.label: Poll Interval (seconds)
poll_interval.description: How often to check job status when waiting for clips
